meanings.sent1: The cheetah is the wiftiest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She was the wiftiest player on the soccer team, always outrunning her opponents.
meanings.sent3: The wiftiest squirrel in the park could dodge every obstacle in its path.
meanings.sent4: His wiftiest dance moves amazed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The wiftiest gazelle leaped gracefully across the savannah.

meanings.definition: Showing a quick and inventive intelligence
meanings.sent1: The wiftiest student in the class always came up with clever solutions.
meanings.sent2: Her wiftiest idea saved the company from a major crisis.
meanings.sent3: The wiftiest detective in town solved the mystery in record time.
meanings.sent4: His wiftiest invention revolutionized the tech industry.
meanings.sent5: The wiftiest scientist discovered a groundbreaking theory.

meanings.definition: Done or achieved quickly and efficiently
meanings.sent1: The chef's wiftiest preparation of the dish impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent2: She completed the project in the wiftiest manner possible.
meanings.sent3: The wiftiest delivery service in town always gets packages to customers on time.
meanings.sent4: His wiftiest decision led to a successful outcome for the team.
meanings.sent5: The wiftiest worker finished the task ahead of schedule.
